step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap Add Layer and create an Empty Layer.=Tap Add Layer and create an Empty Layer.
$$$/Tutorial/Drag the new empty layer to the bottom of the layer stack.=Drag the new empty layer to the bottom of the layer stack.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap the & menu, then Add Camera Fill.=Tap the & menu, then Add Camera Fill.
$$$/Tutorial/Position the tablet to photograph a face.=Position the tablet to photograph a face.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap camera icon to capture the face. Tap Retake to try again or tap Keep to continue.=Tap camera icon to capture the face. Tap Retake to try again or tap Keep to continue.

$$$/Tutorial/To adjust the fit of head to hat, select its layer and tap Transform. Transform the head to fit the hat. Tap Done.=To adjust the fit of head to hat, select its layer and tap Transform. Transform the head to fit the hat. Tap Done.
$$$/Tutorial/If eye patch needs adjustment tap the eye patch layer.=If eye patch needs adjustment tap the eye patch layer.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Transform and move the eye patch into position. Tap Done.=Tap Transform and move the eye patch into position. Tap Done.
